title: 7.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
Given below are the names of some students:
'Alia', 'Tina', 'Raj', 'Ahmad', 'Rick'

Create an ArrayList of student names and add these names. Display the size of the ArrayList to confirm the number of elements.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
